RefParameter.Name: TRACER_EMB_APP_MEM_POOL_SIZE
RefParameter.Description: Default memory pool size for the TRACER_EMB application.

RefParameter.Name: TRACER_EMB_DMA_Request
RefParameter.Comment: USBPD request LPUART/USART IPs TX DMA

Condition.Diagnostic: LPUART1_TX used by DMA Request TX for UART
USART1_TX used by DMA Request TX for UART
USART2_TX used by DMA Request TX for UART
USART3_TX used by DMA Request TX for UART
UART4_TX used by DMA Request TX for UART
UART5_TX used by DMA Request TX for UART

RefParameter.Name: UART_TX_DMA_interrupt
RefParameter.Comment: External Interrupt number for UART TX

Condition.Diagnostic: External Interrupt number for UART TX
Condition.Expression: ((TRACEREMB_LPUART1 & GPDMA1_REQUEST_LPUART1_TX_GPDMA1) | (TRACEREMB_USART1 & GPDMA1_REQUEST_USART1_TX_GPDMA1) | (TRACEREMB_USART2 & GPDMA1_REQUEST_USART2_TX_GPDMA1) | (TRACEREMB_USART3 & GPDMA1_REQUEST_USART3_TX_GPDMA1) | (TRACEREMB_UART4 & GPDMA1_REQUEST_UART4_TX_GPDMA1) | (TRACEREMB_UART5 & GPDMA1_REQUEST_UART5_TX_GPDMA1))

Condition.Diagnostic: External Interrupt number for UART TX
Condition.Expression: ((TRACEREMB_LPUART1 & GPDMA2_REQUEST_LPUART1_TX_GPDMA2) | (TRACEREMB_USART1 & GPDMA2_REQUEST_USART1_TX_GPDMA2) | (TRACEREMB_USART2 & GPDMA2_REQUEST_USART2_TX_GPDMA2) | (TRACEREMB_USART3 & GPDMA2_REQUEST_USART3_TX_GPDMA2) | (TRACEREMB_UART4 & GPDMA2_REQUEST_UART4_TX_GPDMA2) | (TRACEREMB_UART5 & GPDMA2_REQUEST_UART5_TX_GPDMA2))

Condition.Diagnostic: External Interrupt number for UART TX
please enable Asynchronous mode of LPUART1 to use this mode.
please enable Asynchronous mode of USART1 to use this mode.
please enable Asynchronous mode of USART2 to use this mode.
please enable Asynchronous mode of USART3 to use this mode.
please enable Asynchronous mode of UART4 to use this mode.
please enable Asynchronous mode of UART5 to use this mode.
only available when USBPD activated and activated in the same context than USBPD
